content: it s easy to do the graphic pattern that defines this cute crochet dishcloth for the kitchen stitched in 100% cotton lily sugar n cream this cloth is both durable and absorbent featuring the mosaic stitch you ll do mosaic crochet single_crochet double_crochet and chain techniques to create your cloth sugar n cream is available in a selection of delicious shades for a cloth to match any color scheme you ll want to do this pattern more than once so be sure to keep it handy yarn for model lily® sugar n cream® 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m contrast a overcast 01042 1 ball or 50 5 yds/46 5 m contrast b ecru 00004 1 ball or 50 5 yds/46 5 m note 1 ball each of contrast a and b will make 2 dishcloths video tutorial https //youtu be/gmygvsqohog
